description: A next generation, professional-strength screen protector made from raw optical glass material that was specifically designed to protect the LCD screen of your Canon digital camera.Features:*Utilizes a 0.5mm ultra-thin optical glass with at least 90% transmittance and high transparency, allowing the image to display in focus when applied*With special treatment, its toughness and durability is 8H on the Mohs Scale, making the LCD screen practically immune to scratches, bumps, and scrapes*An explosion-proof film with an elasticity pressure of 12kg/cm2 that fully protects the LCD screen from impact damage*Sealed by a 3M double-sided adhesive tape, making it impervious to air bubbles, temperature, humidity, and even sweat, acid, UV rays, and alkali elements*Removable and reusable if the strength of the adhesive has not worn away*Glass protector is composed of 6 layers of professional-strength film to ensure the best longevity for your camera screenSpecifications:*Compatible with: Canon PowerShot S95 Digital Camera model*Note: ***Accessory ONLY, Camera NOT included****Material: Optical glass*Weight: 1.75ozpackage contenent: 1 x GGS Glass LCD Screen Protector for Canon S95
title: GGS Glass LCD Screen Protector for Canon PowerShot S95
